trans-unit.source: Represents a labeled statement or a stand-alone label.
trans-unit.target: 表示標記的陳述式或獨立標籤。

trans-unit.source: CodeLabeledStatement represents a label and optionally, an associated statement.
trans-unit.target: CodeLabeledStatement 代表標籤和 （選擇性） 相關聯的陳述式。

trans-unit.source: A label can be used to indicate the target of a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeGotoStatement>.
To create only a label, leave the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeLabeledStatement.Statement%2A> property uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立僅限索引標籤，將保留<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeLabeledStatement.Statement%2A>未初始化的屬性。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeLabeledStatement.Statement%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Not all languages support `goto` statements and labels, so you should test wheter a code generator supports `goto` statements and labels by calling the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator.Supports%2A> method with the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport> flag.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 並非所有語言都支援`goto`陳述式和標籤，所以您應該測試程式碼產生器支援的主`goto`陳述式和標籤藉由呼叫<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator.Supports%2A>方法<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport>旗標。</xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport> </xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator.Supports%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeLabeledStatement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeLabeledStatement"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeLabeledStatement"></xref> class using the specified label name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeLabeledStatement"></xref>類別使用指定的標籤名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeLabeledStatement"></xref> class using the specified label name and statement.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeLabeledStatement"></xref>類別使用陳述式與指定的標籤名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"></xref> to associate with the label.
Gets or sets the name of the label.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定標籤的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the optional associated statement.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定選擇性的相關陳述式。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not set, the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeLabeledStatement> represents only a label, rather than a labeled statement.
trans-unit.target: 如果未設定這個屬性，<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeLabeledStatement>表示僅限索引標籤，而非標記的陳述式。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeLabeledStatement>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"></xref> that indicates the statement associated with the label.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"> </xref> ，指出與 label 相關的陳述式。
